title: Campgrounds IV Collectors Edition 1.0 – Time Management Game
content: Something has gone wrong for Addie’s friend, the Shaman. He’s been developing campsites, but it appears he has an enemy undoing his hard work. It’s up to you to repair the campsites and get the Shaman back on track. Journey from mountaintops to muddy swamps as you encounter new challenges and secrets. Discover hidden maps […]

title: Memoirs of Murder 3 Behind the Scenes CE 1.0 – Hidden Object Adventure Game
content: What starts out as a fun vacation to a true crime film set turns disastrous when Aaron’s cousin Kevin is accused of murdering the lead actress. Everybody in this small town is certain he’s the killer, but Aaron and Mary suspect someone is framing Kevin to take the fall. Can they prove Kevin’s innocence, or […]

title: Little Snitch 4.4.3 – Alerts you to outgoing network connections
content: Little Snitch gives you control over your private outgoing data.   Track background activity As soon as your computer connects to the Internet, applications often have permission to send any information wherever they need to. Little Snitch takes note of this activity and allows you to decide for yourself what happens with this data.   […]

title: PhotoArtista Sketch 2.7 – Wispy Pencil Sketching and Shading Effect
content: Photo Artista Sketch converts your photo into a sketch with wispy lines and delicate shading to achieve a lightly sketched rendered drawing. In contrast to most digital art media, Artista Sketch comes very close to hand-drawn artwork seen only before in sketches created by human artists.   PENCIL STYLE Sketch – toggles between two stroke […]

title: PhotoArtista Oil 2.57 – Transforms a treasured photograph into a beautiful work of art
content: PhotoArtista is an automatic painting tool that takes no time to master in order to create your own original work of art. Our efficient method in a simple interface requires a few easy steps: Start with a photo, choose a paint style, and then apply … let the application do the work.   All that […]

title: PhotoArtista Haiku 2.55 – Stylized Watercolor Painting Software
content: Artista Haiku will add spontaneity to your pictures. This creative media incorporates traditional techniques as well as the non-traditional such as digital photography, and vintage papers to create a unique painting filled with movement and meaning.   To capture the atmospheric mysteries in your scene try reducing the outline to the scantiest detail, and reducing […]

title: Hallows Eve 1.13 – Turn photos into spooky Halloween scenes
content: In the spirit of Halloween JixiPix presents a fun way to create spooktacularly creepy scenes with your photo. Start by selecting an eerie scene from the included presets or hit the randomize button for unlimited frightful toning effects. These dark thrilling effects combined with haunted Halloween objects are sure to send shivers down your spine […]

title: Happy Holidaze 1.0.4 – Create Holiday Greetings with Hand Painted Embellishments
content: Happy Holidaze, in typical JixiPix fashion, is all about adding creative touches to your holiday cheer. Start out by antiquing your photo, choose a festive background pattern, and embellish it with incredible pieces of art—all hand painted—to make your photo design fun, elegant, and cheerful.   Talk about a quick and fun way to add […]

title: The Sims 3 Complete Collection 64-bit 1.67.2 – Welcome to the neighborhood ( WineSkin )
content: The Sims 3 Complete Collection will inspire you with endless creative possibilities and amuse you with unexpected moments of surprise and mischief! Create over a million unique Sims and control their lives. Customize everything from their appearances, to their personalities and even the home of their dreams. title: HoudahSpot 5.0.11 – Advanced file-search tool
content: HoudahSpot is a versatile desktop search tool. Use HoudahSpot to locate hard-to-find files and keep frequently used files within reach.   HoudahSpot will immediately feel familiar.
